lines.text: Yo! Champ in making! Welcome to Helium Heights!
If you're looking for the Flying Gym, you've found it - literally! This Gym is flying!
The leader is a legendary fighter pilot! The tales say he used to do Pok√©mon battles on the wings of his plane - mid-flight!
Don't let the hot air balloons fool you - those are for his grandkids! He was a fierce pilot, and now he is a fierce opponent.
